text: Wabuyela ke uMûsâ kubantu bakubo, enomsindo, ekhathazekile. Wathi: “Hini na bantu bakuthi, ingaba iNkosi yenu Ayinenzelanga isithembiso esilungileyo na? Ingaba ke ngoku ixesha (lokuzalisekiswa kwaso) besele likude kangako na kuni, okanye niye nanqwenela ukuba ingqumbo ka-Allâh ihle phezu kwenu, kangokuba nide naphule isithembiso senu (sokundithobela) mna?”
